rukus.text: Youxie ren [wei xinzhe] shuo:“Women yi xinyang an la he mori.” Qishi, tamen bingfei zhen xinshi.
Tamen [wangtu] qipian an la he xinshimen, qishi, tamen zhishi zi qi er wei ganjue dao.
Tamen de xin li you bing, er an la shi tamen jiazhongle bing. Tamen jiang wei chang shuo huangyan [zhu] er shou tongku de xingfa.
Dang youren dui tamen shuo:“Nimen buyao zai dadishang zuo'e” shi, tamen jiu shuo:“Women zhishi tiaojie zhe.”
Xuzhi, tamen que shi zuo'e zhe, dan tamen wei ganjue dao.

Dang youren dui tamen [wei xinzhe] shuo:“Nimen yinggai xiang renmen [mu sheng de zhuisui zhe] suo xinyang di nayang xinyang” shi, tamen jiu shuo:“Nandao yao women xiang yurenmen suo xinyang di nayang xinyang ma?” Xuzhi, tamen que shi yu ren [zhu], dan tamen bu zhidao.

Dang tamen yujian xinshimen shi, tamen jiu shuo:“Women xinyangle.” Dan dang tamen sixia yu tamen de emomen [duoshenjiao tu yu wei xinzhe deng] xiangju shi, tamen jiu shuo:“Women que shi nimen de tongdao, women zhishi chaonong [xinshi] eryi.”
An la jiang yi chaonong huan bao tamen, jiang rang tamen zai tamen de beini zhong gengjia mangcong.
Zhexie ren yi zhengdao huanqu mi wu, tamen de jiaoyi [ji fangqi zhengdao, zunxing mi wu] bing wei huo yi. Tamen bushi zunxing zhengdao zhe.

Tamen de qingkuang youru ran huo zhi ren [zhu] de qingkuang, dang huoguang zhao liang ta de zhouwei shi, an la na zoule tamen de huoguang, ba tamen reng zai chongchong hei'an zhong,[suoyi] tamen kan bujian [renhe zhengdao].
[Tamen shi] longzi, yaba, xiazi, yin'er tamen wufa fanhui [zhengdao].

[Tamen de qingkuang] youru congtian'erjiang de baoyu, limian shi chongchong hei'an, leidian jiaojia. Youyu pa lei sheng zhen si, tamen jiu ba shouzhi sai jin erduo, dan an la shi zhouzhi bu xinyang zhe de.

Shandian jihu duo zoule tamen de shijue. Mei dang dianguang wei tamen zhao liang shi, tamen jiu zai qizhong xingzou; mei dang hei'an longzhao tamen shi, tamen jiu tingzhi bu qian. Jiaru an la yiyu, ta bi duo zou tamen de tingjue he shijue. An la dui wanshi que shi wanneng de.
